title: Conferences
description: I am an enthusiastic and experienced speaker, since 2016 I have been dedicated to traveling the world speaking at conferences
content: I am an enthusiastic and experienced speaker, since 2016 I have been dedicated to traveling the world speaking at as many conferences as possible, mainly <0>WordCamps</0>. Although I would love to participate in some other type of conference, my favorite topics are <0>WordPress and Javascript</0>.
cta: Want to invite me to one? <1 /> <0>Send me an email</0>.
